text:
<@U068TGY7MFB> there is a special channel
lists-api-v3

Hey People! :wave: :wave-yeti:

I am using the `CRM Extension`  card on the `DEAL` record type and *want to know:*
• How to know which `company/contact` is *linked* to this deal?
I only see deal properties that have no linkage to contacts/companies, so how can we know to which contact/company the deal is linked using the `fetch request` ?

Thanks a bunch in advance :gd_dancing_bear:

Has anyone come across socket hangup issues on HubSpot api? i have a production app (aws hosted api that uses HubSpot nodejs library to interact with HubSpot), and im seeing a lot of errors like this thats crashing my api:
```request to <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals/search> failed, reason: socket hang up```
Where this is happening is when im doing a deal search api call using nodejs library, sometimes the call to do the search takes like a minute and then throws the above error. Im definitely not doing anything wrong in terms of inputs, the api keys are fully valid too, and this same endpoint works perfectly fine most of the time - this is a rare occurrence (but given i have this endpoint being hit quite frequently, the rare occurrence happens quite often).

...has anyone else come across such error? any insight would be appreciated.

also sometimes the error is:
```request to <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals/search> failed, reason: Client network socket disconnected before secure TLS connection was established```

Also to be clear <@U068TGY7MFB>, this isn't HubSpot support - it's a place to connect with the broader developer community to see if there are any other developers (outside of HubSpot) who have solved similar challenges
<@UQNEXHW14> Can HubSpot afford to hire just one person who will be answering to the questions here? a few hours a day at least

Hello All,
I´m trying to create Contacts but I´ve error with
```SimplePublicObjectInputForCreate```
I´m using the example code:

```import HubSpot
from pprint import pprint
from HubSpot.crm.contacts import SimplePublicObjectInputForCreate, ApiException

client = HubSpot.Client.create(access_token="xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx")

properties = {
    "email": "",
    "firstname": "Kevin Data prueba",
    "hs_whatsapp_phone_number": "",
    "guia": "123",
    "tipo": "Cliente final",
    "country": "México",
    "categoria_de_producto": "Otras Categorías",
    "hs_lead_status": "NEW"
}
simple_public_object_input_for_create = SimplePublicObjectInputForCreate(associations=[], properties=properties)
try:
    api_response = client.crm.contacts.basic_api.create(simple_public_object_input_for_create=simple_public_object_input_for_create)
    pprint(api_response)
except ApiException as e:
    print("Exception when calling basic_api->create: %s\n" % e)```
Does anyone know whats the problem??

```ImportError: cannot import name 'SimplePublicObjectInputForCreate'```
thanks

i dont use python, but a simple google got me here, looks relavent: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/SimplePublicObjectInputForCreate-does-not-exist-probably-wrong/td-p/771512?profile.language=en>
Hi! <@U05SWLALQ5P>, did you find the answer? I'm in the same crusade :melting_face:
